mapper.sql: SELECT menu_id, menu_name, title, parent_id, parent_name, menu_sort, component, `path`, url, menu_type, visible, i_frame, cache_flag, ifnull(perms,'') AS perms, icon, status, create_by, create_time FROM sys_menu
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.title, m.component, m.path, m.url, m.visible, i_frame, m.menu_sort, cache_flag, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.status, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ur.role_id = ro.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND m.visible = 0 AND ro.status = 1 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.menu_sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.title, m.component, m.path, m.url, m.visible, i_frame, cache_flag, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.menu_sort, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND m.visible = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.menu_sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE m.visible = 0 AND r.status = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT concat(m.menu_id, ifnull(m.perms,'')) AS perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.menu_sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( menu_id, parent_id, parent_name, menu_name, title, menu_sort, component, `path`, url, menu_type, visible, i_frame, cache_flag, perms, icon, status, remark, create_by, create_time ) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{parentName}, #{menuName}, #{title}, #{menuSort}, #{component}, #{path}, #{url}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{iFrame}, #{cacheFlag}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
